a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Annual working hours per worker vs. GDP per capita, 1870 to 2017
GDP per capita is adjusted for inflation and for differences in the cost of living between countries.
Average annual working hours per worker
Data source: Our World in Data based on Huberman & Minns (2007) and PWT 9.1 (2019); Bolt and van Zanden - Maddison Project
Note: Before 1950 the data corresponds only to full-time production workers (non-agricultural activities). GDP per capita is expressed in
